mean_en: an object made of short stiff hairs (called bristles ) or wires set in a block of wood or plastic, usually attached to a handle. Brushes are used for many different jobs, such as cleaning, painting, writing and tidying your hair.
sentence: Brushes of different sizes may be applied in different situations.
sentence_trans: 不同尺寸的画笔用于不同的情况。
